titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable, the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, the humble petition of the gentry, ministers, free-holders, and other substantiall inhabitants of the county of York.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at York, and reprinted at London for Richard Lownes,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
